data.message:
the layout idea u guys came up with ( the graphics ,cursor's , text ) n stuff , can be a major reason when facebook is gonna fall down ! u guys are doing something which orkut and hi5 did much before facebook where myspace is all about this only .i.e designing your page ! it sux bigtime..and makes the overall processing all the more slower , talking about my opinion you guys should be what you are and keep it simple !its a lot more funn that ways .. all the best in your future endevours mr . zuckerberg ! btw the movie social network based on you is nice - a must watch ! u re a genius :) thnx saurav kalra

I sent you a smiley! Want to see it? http://www.facebook.com/apps/application.php?id=116318625062183&v=app_4949752878&partner=ZNzfb010_ZNzfb013YYIN
